links.title: Spotify's IPO Filing Is Mostly Better Than Expected
links.description: As Spotify's valuation has surged above $20 billion in private trades, there's been plenty of debate about whether the online music leader will find a way to eliminate its massive operating losses as it keeps battling the likes of Apple ( AAPL) , Amazon.com ( AMZN) and Alphabet's ( GOOGL) YouTube.
